title: DMN -The Perfect Life The Perfect Pain (2008)
description:
DMN -The Perfect Life The Perfect Pain (2008)

About DMN -The Perfect Life The Perfect Pain (2008):

What&#039;s up ya&#039;ll i go by the name of DMN!
I&#039;m 17 years old, from Tromso, Norway. Born and raised.
The last two years i&#039;ve made an album, called "The Perfect Life, The Perfect Pain"
It contains 20 tracks, two featuring Shirish Zahir, Three featuring Rustom, two featuring
Toby Stafford, two featuring Pronto, and two featuring Mimmi.
The album is a great, dark, sophisticated, poetic and truly intellectual masterpiece!

But after all..This album is not exactly what i wanted it to be.
Because through the development and making of it, it took twists and turns...
But not even my life is what i wanted it to be man..nah, i wanted my life to be perfect!
But when i sat down and began to write these songs, i realised something!
Nuthin in life is perfect, wich means that if you find your perfect life,
it will follow a perfect pain.
Life is not short, nah not at all, its long, very long, so it&#039;s up to you to find your
perfect life. But beware, for the pain will come,and u will hit bottom,
but it&#039;s about rising up again!
Continuing your path, beliving in your self, and mostly in the times when nobody else belives
in you. I guess this album is all about realisaition. But not as much as it is about
moving on, finding inner peace and learning to live in the now,here and this moment.
I found my perfect life... Have you found yourse?
